short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically redirect streamer raids directly to the raided channel so your view counts towards the streamers total.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make your raid view count!
Get rid of the pesky "referrer=raid" flag in the URL that stops your view from counting towards the streamers concurrent viewers! Replace it with something much more positive. How about some random compliments
